## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G24503](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G24503)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ALDH1A, ALDH2C4, REF1</u>
- **Gene Name:** aldehyde dehydrogenase 1A, aldehyde dehydrogenase 2C4, REDUCED EPIDERMAL FLUORESCENCE1
- **Description:**   aldehyde dehydrogenase 2C4;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
